body:
Latest sampgdk release is **3.1.3**

### Downloads

Download C/C++ headers and pre-compiled binaries for your operating system:

* [Linux (self-extracting archive)](https://github.com/Zeex/sampgdk/raw/downloads/sampgdk-3.1.3-Linux.sh)
* [Linux (tarball)](https://github.com/Zeex/sampgdk/raw/downloads/sampgdk-3.1.3-Linux.tar.gz)
* [Windows (installer)](https://github.com/Zeex/sampgdk/raw/downloads/sampgdk-3.1.3-win32.exe)
* [Windows (ZIP archive)](https://github.com/Zeex/sampgdk/raw/downloads/sampgdk-3.1.3-win32.zip)

Older versions can be found [here](https://github.com/Zeex/sampgdk/tree/downloads).

***

### About

sampgdk is a library that allows one to write game modes for SA:MP in C++ or plain C rather than in Pawn. It is basically a layer on top of the official plugin SDK that provides an ability for plugins to call server's  native functions and react on various events (callbacks) just like Pawn scripts do.
